name: Nomad's Sky
description:
***Game a Week: Project #13***

A No Man's Sky demake

  • Travel to different procedurally made star systems and planets
  • Gather materials to sell at the space station

Star Map: WASD to move, ENTER to enter a star or space station

Star System: A & D to rotate, SPACE for thrusters

Planet: WASD to move, ENTER to mine
